segments.text: My attention is drawn to the unstable stool where the boy is standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed outwards, and it looks like it could tip at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched quite far, his body angled awkwardly towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the precarious wobble of the stool beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A sudden slip or a slight shift in weight could send him tumbling backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling from that height makes me feel genuinely fearful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily injure himself on the hard kitchen floor or the counter edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the plate he's holding could shatter into dangerous pieces.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep watching, half expecting to see him lose his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains unaware, diligently drying her plate, facing away from the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This hidden hazard is certainly the most concerning part of the scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the imminent possibility of a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a tense moment, watching the boy retrieve those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
